post.summary: 升级后端（并可返回重启模式）

get.description: type=1 携带 secret、version 上报节点心跳；type=0 作为管理端订阅节点状态

cycleMonths.description: New: prefer cycleMonths (1/3/6/12). cycleDays kept for backward-compat (30/90/180/365)

github.example: curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NiuStar/network-panel/refs/heads/main/install.sh -o install.sh && sudo bash install.sh -a 1.2.3.4:6365 -s secret

local.example: curl -fsSL http://1.2.3.4:6365/install.sh -o install.sh && sudo bash install.sh -a 1.2.3.4:6365 -s secret

static.example: curl -fsSL https://panel-static.199028.xyz/network-panel/install.sh -o install.sh && sudo bash install.sh -a 1.2.3.4:6365 -s secret
